text: Can the Vidyard Video integration be updated so the poster images use srcset at the very least, and have customizable resolutions or auto set resolutions based on javascript? I have a page filled with videos and the resolution on those images is all 1920 x 1080 causing the page to take forever to load
Also some optimization on load time of the videos would really be nice
don’t care if the video first plays at 480p resolution, the video players are not usable for like 25 seconds - on chrome on a 212mbps internet connection

I think there should be an option in Settings > Nav Builder for adding classes/ID to each element of the menu.  If devs can't access the code and there is no option for it, this is not very intuitive.
Can you share the page you’re talking about?
a menu walker is one of my biggest wishes -- until then you have to use JS to add classes in
